item.title: A Shelter Full of Cats
item.description:
Title: A Shelter Full of Cats
Genre: Casual , Indie
Developer: Devcats
Publisher: Devcats
Franchise: Devcats
Release Date: Dec 9, 2024




About This Game



Everyone can be a hero! Help a cat rescuer take care of her rescuees and root for their adoption! Every cat deserves a chance to be loved. ❤️

A Shelter Full of Cats is a hidden object game set in a cat shelter specially designed for cats with special needs. Join the Shelter's manager, Hannah, as she prepares a charity party to help these cats find their forever homes. Let's show that love has no boundaries!




You know those times when you’re walking down the street and end up meeting a stray cat?
You feel sorry for it, and you want to give it all the love it deserves, right?
I’m Hannah, and I used to feel that way.
Then I decided to step forward and do something.
Now I rescue special needs cats, as they are often overlooked.
Can you help me take care of them?
I'll be waiting for you in a "A SHELTER FULL OF CATS".
Let’s make the world a better place! ❤️



Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

Linux

item.title: Wild Woods
item.description:
Title: Wild Woods
Genre: Action , Casual , Indie , Early Access
Developer: Octofox Games
Publisher: Daedalic Entertainment
Franchise: Daedalic Entertainment
Release Date: Dec 9, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Dec 9, 2024




About This Game



Wild Woods is a couch co-op game full of action, teamwork and woodland critters. One to four players take on the role of brave little cats defending their wooden wagon on its way through a dangerous forest.

Clever cooperation is key as their way is full of obstacles. While daytime is all about collecting resources and improving your trusty wagon, things get risky during the night. When the sun sets, bandit bunnies and badgers rally to attack! The feline friends must defend their wagon while ensuring their beacon fire does not die out.



During their journey players must consider how they want to approach the dangers of each adventure. Extra rewards await if they decide to go for challenging encounters! Will you keep stacking challenges to try and go for the biggest prize?
On the other hand, going a safer route might allow for more risk-free collection of resources. Discover the thrill of choosing your own level of risk — it's all part of the adventure.
Each journey has its own course and it is up to you to make wise decisions accordingly.



Play the way you want to. Multiplayer sessions in Wild Woods can be played locally, fully online, or with a mix of local and online players! Using the Remote Play Together feature, you can simulate local play even if your friends are in faraway places.
Chase new high scores with your friends and, while you are playing, unlock new skins for your favorite band of cats!



Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.
    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS *: Windows 8.1, 10 or 11 64bit
    • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
    • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 520
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

item.title: Laundry Store Simulator
item.description:
Title: Laundry Store Simulator
Genre: Indie , Simulation
Developer: Akhir Pekan Studio
Publisher: PlayWay S.A.
Franchise: PlayWay S.A.
Release Date: Dec 9, 2024




About This Game

Are you ready to own the world's best laundry store? Transform a small laundry shop into a laundry empire!

Discover the following features in Laundry Store Simulator:

Build a small laundry store into a thriving business empire! Upgrade your equipment, design and expand your store, hire staff, and more!

Upgrade your equipment to provide exceptional cleaning services! Invest in high-quality washing machines, dryers, ironing equipment, and even automated washing machines!

Create a stylish and inviting space to attract customers! Provide comfortable seating, warm decorations, and more funsies to welcome your customers!

Grow your laundry business by unlocking new areas and features, offering complimentary services to attract more customers!

Build a dedicated team to manage your laundry store efficiently! Hire qualified and experienced staff laundry attendants, such as, washers, dryers, and more!

Boost your profits by selling cleaning supplies and becoming a one-stop shop for laundry needs! Offer a variety of cleaning products, including detergents, fabric softeners, stain removers, and more!

Unleash your creativity by designing custom shirts for unique customers! Draw anything, print it, and watch them proudly wear your creations in style!

    • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 4GB or equivalent
    • DirectX: Version 10
    • Storage: 2 GB available space
    • Sound Card: Yes

item.title: Tobacco Shop Simulator
item.description:
Title: Tobacco Shop Simulator
Genre: Casual , Indie , Simulation , Early Access
Developer: Business Tycoon
Publisher: Business Tycoon
Release Date: Dec 9, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Dec 9, 2024




About This Game

This is a first-person simulation game where you step into the role of a tobacco shop owner.

Work alone or with friends to expand your humble shop into a huge tobacco shop.

Co-Op Mode and Single Player

Share the duties with your friends in co-op mode (for up to 4 players).

The more players in the store, the more demanding customers will visit your store.

Also, you can go solo and manage everything in the store. You can invite your friends anytime if you change your mind.

Store Workflow

Sign contracts with leading brands, order new products with an in-game computer or with your tablet while walking in the store, unpack the boxes, place the products into your store, and set the prices for your products.

Consider the market prices while setting up your product prices in the store for customer satisfaction.

Always keep your store clean so as not to lose any customers. Also, be careful with the thieves to avoid some box losses that would cause a leak in your finances.

Products

Please make sure your customers find all their needs in the store.

Always expand your product portfolio and satisfy your customers.

Cigarettes, lighters, pipes, cigars, ashtrays, hookahs, e-cigarettes, tobacco, and smoking accessories...

Be aware of the market prices and purchase more products when they're cheap.

Customers

Place a sufficient number of checkouts to reduce the waiting time for customers.

Scan products and collect payments whether in cash or with card purchases.

Don't forget to fulfill the online orders.

Expansions and New Teammates

Expand your store and warehouse by leveling up your store and budget.

Hire stockers to fill the racks.

Purchase more cash registers and hire new cashiers to minimize long queues at the checkouts and to reduce waiting time for customers.

item.title: Bat to the Heavens
item.description:
Title: Bat to the Heavens
Genre: Action , Adventure , Indie
Developer: ceroro
Publisher: ceroro
Release Date: Dec 9, 2024




About This Game

Your hometown has grown quieter over the years. It's time to leave, and the only way out is up! But can you even make it to the end?

A bat and your wits are all you need to surpass any obstacle! Climb to the heavens, and discover the secrets across the valley in this challenging puzzle - execution - momentum game!

features

  • Yes. There are checkpoints. That way I can make it harder! ( and more satisfying )

  • Your progress is always saved baby

  • Hand drawn sprites / characters!

  • Deep mechanics behind simple unorthodox controls (bat)

  • A movement system that has lots of depth and mastery! use that brain

  • Challenging puzzles that seem impossible at first, but always have clean solutions!

  • I believe in you!!

  • No limits! go as fast as you can no one will catch you*

  • Lots of secrets I put a lot of secrets I think good luck!

  • A handful of characters!!

  • No combat*

  • creacher

  • Uhhh mini games?

  • (background) animals that rhyme with bat

  • (background) animals that dont rhyme with bat

*(you can go real fast)

use brain!! warning brain use may be required
